input.sentences: this is the beautiful photo i took of the house from vacation
here is a view of the backyard . is n't that a lovely place ?
some folks we met along the way

the ocean below the cliffs on our bus trip around the island
output.sentences: The old friends went to a vacation house to hang out for a long weekend.
The sat in rocking chairs for an afternoon to enjoy the lovely view from the backyard.
They met some folks in town later for a late afternoon lunch.
The next day they took a day trip to the ocean.
